website_summaries.verdict: A soft toothbrush that works well for people with sensitive teeth and gums.
pros: Soft bristles perfect for sensitive teeth
Brush size is suitable for small mouths
cons: Some feel the handle could be larger and more ergonomic

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush if you're looking for a soft bristle!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this I thought...a black tooth brush?? I have no idea if the charcoal is doing anything. I really don't care that much. I have a difficult time finding a truly soft toothbrush. They might say soft or extra soft, but when I get them home there usually is nothing soft about them. This brush is great. I can feel the bristles getting between my teeth and it's very comfortable for me to use. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are the best manual toothbrushes I’ve ever used AND they’re more affordable ...
customer_reviews.text: After using twice, I ordered another set for me and a set for my mom. These are the best manual toothbrushes I’ve ever used AND they’re more affordable than what I would pay for standard toothbrushes at the store. They are so soft and comfortable on my gums, but the little bristles feel like they get in between my teeth better than any other toothbrush I’ve used. Plus the compact head reaches comfortably into ever place in my mouth. Love these and plan to use them from now on! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the name brands 'charcoal' floss bristle.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. I have gum recession despite 3 dental hygienist visits a year. I do it all as they tell me. They wanted me to try finding extra soft bristled brushes, and I've had a similar product before from a name brand. So I got these! They're actually better in my opinion because the handle is designed with a hole in the center. It likely conserve resources for the manufacture to offer these at low prices. The added bonus for us is that the handle flexes and reminds you to not 'over brush' by brushing too hard. Hopefully I'll see improvement in my gums.
customer_reviews.author: W805

customer_reviews.title: Solid toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft bristle toothbrush. I feel these clean my teeth much better than a traditional brush. I have a bad habit of not flossing, and I believe this brush is helping with that aspect also. This brush really irritated my gums at first (similar to flossing). After about a week, there is no irritation and flossing hurts much lesser now also. As for the charcoal aspect I can not really comment. I use this brush with charcoal based toothpaste, so I do not know if it is helping or not. However, I figure it can not hurt. As for the design, it is solid. The head of brush fits my mouth perfectly, and the handle provides an excellent grip.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them!  Super soft, exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My gums have recently started receding apparently after many years of brushing too hard (who knew?!?). My dentist recommended that I start using an extra soft toothbrush, but I couldn't find any in stores (I'm 46 and having a hard time changing my "brushing too hard" habit!). I saw these here and decided to give them a try. I absolutely LOVE them! They're SUPER soft and I can brush as hard as I want and the toothbrush keeps me from harming my gum-line any further. :) They're exactly what I was looking for and what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: jvan71

customer_reviews.title: The right kind of soft
customer_reviews.text: My whole family was amazed with how soft yet firm these brushes are. It feels like the perfect fit and the design feels right for your hand. I've used so many different types of toothbrushes in my life and this one by far is my favorite. I've only had these for a week so I can't speak on the longevity of these, but so far I'm 110% happy with these and so is the rest of my crew. I have nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Family

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on Gums and whiten teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to these brushes because my other toothbrush was tearing up my gums. These work well to brighten your teeth and are gentle on gums. However, sometimes they are a little too gentle and don't get food off of the tops of your back teeth.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Handle bends when brushing
customer_reviews.text: First, the good. The head is on the smaller side, so great for getting into the back of the mouth. The "flossing" bristles are my favorite type and these are middle-of-the-road as far as flossing brushes go. The bristles are soft (which is a matter of personal taste) and overall comfortable. The bad. The handle. It is small enough to fit into a standard toothbrush holder and I like the idea of using less plastic with an open section. Sadly, the practical result of that is that the colored part is so flexible the brush will bend when using it. It's not much, just enough to make brushing feel weird and to give the whole brush a low-quality experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A very good, very soft toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: This brush feels and acts like a very soft brush should. Too many advertise as very soft but aren't or they are so soft you may as well use a feather. The cost is excellent; about 1/4 of the more expensive, big name brands. And they seem to last well. My wife is a serious, three times a day, brusher and hers is going on 9 months in use.
customer_reviews.author: dneil

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really have super high hopes for these brushes but I figured I’d try them. The bristles start off kinda hard (I usually use extra soft brushes) but do soften pretty quickly. I have not noticed any significant whitening since using these and it has been about 3 months. The head of the brush is small and I don’t feel like it cleaned my whole mouth the way other brushes do. Eh, it was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: mnmr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my mouth bones
customer_reviews.text: Extra soft bristles with pointed tips -- exactly like my dental hygienist told me to use but is impossible to find in stores. The charcoal-infused bristles are not entirely a gimmick: It makes it super easy to see how much crusty leftover toothpaste is on the brush as well as clearly indicates when the bristles are worn by showing through to the lighter color underneath. Does a great job of working loose little bits of crud stuck between your gumline and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush I've ever used - even if it black!  LOL
customer_reviews.text: Since I have extremely sensitive gums, even the "soft toothbrushes" are painful to use, even kids brushes. I hesitantly tried these..hesitantly because I couldn't imagine putting a black toothbrush in my mouth! Well, it was a eureka moment from first use! They are super soft, clean teeth well, and I can even scrub my gums, all with little or no bleeding. Now I can finally enjoy brushing my teeth again! I'm recommending this type of toothbrush to anyone (even my dental hygienist made an order) & I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I saw an ad for charcoal toothbrushes on TV and after my husband bugged me about it, I ordered these ones. I didn’t have many expectations because it’s just toothbrushes! I was wrong. These are awesome. They are so soft and durable. No breakdown of bristles like other toothbrushes and my teeth feel so nice and clean. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Beckiboobear

customer_reviews.title: Can't go back to non-charcoal
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest toothbrushes I've ever used. I am a stress-brusher. I channel my stress into brushing my teeth and as a result [of the stresses of adulting], I started to recede my own gums. These toothbrushes are so soft that even though the stresses of life haven't gone away, at least I'm not bloodying my own gums. Once I experienced the luxury of charcoal toothbrush bristles, I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax Chan

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these toothbrushes twice before, I really like them, so much now my son also uses them. They seemed to clean my teeth better and more completely than other toothbrushes I have used over the years. My first cleaning after using them impressed the dental hygienist too, she said I had less plaque and was going to check into buying these for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Julie  S.

customer_reviews.title: Not that soft....
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to using soft toothbrushes for sensitive gums that my dentist gives me. This brush is too harsh for me. It's not as stiff as a regular toothbrush, but is definitely not a really soft toothbrush. I bought them also because I use the charcoal toothpaste and it discolors my other brushes, but I'll just have to deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: L. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Our go to toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Mom was complaining her soft toothbrush was hurting her gums. My brother did his research and found these for her/us. She loves these, they are softer than her prior "soft" toothbrush. They also have a comfortable grip. These are a great buy and came with 4 in the pack. We will have to buy another pack for a spare for when it is time to switch them out. These have become our new go to "Soft" toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Soft & Effective! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and gave these a try! So glad I did! I need a soft toothbrush. Still, I want one that actually functions as well! This is a perfect soft toothbrush in my opinion! Wonderfully soft and gets the job done! I well buy these as long as they are for sale! Thanks for making a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good product, soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time ordering these. The quality is decent and the bristles are very soft. For the price and for those with sensitive gums, this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BWhitTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Softest of them all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought many other toothbrushes that were advertised as “Soft”. These were the softest ones I’ve ever purchased, my teeth are happy and my gums are not looking like sliced corned beef anymore. They look cheap honestly, not stylish at all, but they’re really soft and that’s all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Silvaster1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bristles!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this toothbrush. The bristles are soft enough for receding gums but firm enough to give a good clean feel. The only thing I would change is put some scrapers on the back of the head for the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Faveleiro

customer_reviews.title: Love the tech behind the brush.
customer_reviews.text: I like the technology here. The brush is very good level of soft. I like the handle w the outake tech; it makes the toothbrush very flexible which keeps everyone from bearing doen too hard on their gums. I brush too hard so i need a toothbrush that keeps me in check. I bought more for the whole house after critiquing! Happy purchase. .
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I'd never liked soft bristles after trying some years ago
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about buying these toothbrushes. Soft bristles, charcoal..... I'd never liked soft bristles after trying some years ago. I'd never tried charcoal. The bristles on this toothbrush are indeed soft, gentle, but they are made so well, to do the job! I am very satisfied with this purchase and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fish

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning with a soft touch
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are just as soft as they said in the packaging. They leave my teeth very clean and white. I'm even having my kids use them now and they were amused with the black brittles lol. Update: I've been using these for over a year now and I won't use any other brand. My teeth feel super clean after brushing, my gums don't bleed anymore because the brush is so soft, yet cleans deep within the gums. I highly recommend these toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not effective! For my teeth
customer_reviews.text: Didn't effectively remove stains from my teeth. I used the brush for about a month and noticed my teeth becoming darker around the sides. Thought maybe I had just gone too long without a dentist cleaning. I then bought an Oral B brush and after one brushing, the stains were almost entirely removed. Have discontinued the charcoal brush and my teeth are back to their state before using. Maybe the bristles were too soft, maybe the charcoal wasn't cleaning effectively or maybe the charcoal itself was staining - I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very very soft bristles but you can tell they are still doing what they need to do! Nice slim design helps me get to my back teeth a bit better. I would recommend this to a friend and anyone with sensitive teeth and/or gums.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER soft which is what I need according to my dentist. They clean AMAZINGLY, feel really good on your tongue and gums. Great value. Way softer then the name brand charcoal brushes put there that claim they are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bogherie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothbrushes! Great for sensitive teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I have been using them for less than a week and I can already see a difference in how white my teeth are. My teeth are super sensitive, so I love how soft and gentle they are on my teeth but I can still feel them getting in my teeth and cleaning them so well. I highly recommend these! Won't be buying any other kind of toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.author: Asmaa Ali

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great at cleaning teeth
customer_reviews.text: We love this toothbrushes, second time around buying a pack. Have looked and bought soft brushes at stores and non compare to this ones. They are so good at getting in and cleaning, my dentist adviced me a while back to use a soft one, the harder ones where to rough on my enamel and I had sensitive teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure the charcoal does anything, but the bristles are wonderful. The handle is slightly flexible and I like the ergonomic feel.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma to 3

customer_reviews.title: Soft and not too large
customer_reviews.text: The features I care about in a toothbrush are soft bristles and a compact head. If I had to choose between the two, soft bristles would be number one. These bristles are very soft, and the head, while not compact, is on the smaller side, so it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: ANM

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical but we really love these toothbrushes. They're more like tooth polishers and we both notice they're better than what we've used in the past. The very thin bristles clean between the teeth better than the well known brands. We will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: BhB

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush I've found yet!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are very sensitive, so I need super soft bristles on my toothbrush. I've tried numerous toothbrushes that claim to be soft, and these are easily the best ones I've found. Will definitely keep buying these again and again.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Finally... a toothbrush with truly soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: It is a good value, perhaps even a great value, and would be an amazing value if it were not for a concern I have with one aspect of the ergonomic features of the brush...that being that I found the handle a bit too slim and too flexible, or giving (i.e., not stiff enough), which may be a purely preferential consideration, but I do acknowledge it as an opinion. Each individual will simply have to decide where it fits on their spectrum of ergonomically comfortable and functional. That being said there can be no doubt about the quality and softness of the bristles...a true "5 Stars"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Ross

customer_reviews.title: great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these tooth brushes. I have been using them for a year now. Will only be buying these for my family. Bristles are soft for children and adults with sensitive gums. I love that the bristle area is not large.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID J RAGSDALE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tooth brush!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend. He has very sensitive gums and he said this is the first tooth brush that he can use without being in pain. The bristles are great because they are super soft yet they clean very well because they are tapered and almost act like floss. We both love these! Glad I ordered them
customer_reviews.author: Heather Haven

customer_reviews.title: Bristles started coming off, a lot
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with a toothbrush? Well, for the first time in my life, I did. During the first use itself, bristles started coming out, not one or two, dozens and dozens. Gonna return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softest and gentlest bristles!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used lots of other brand's soft bristles toothbrushes. But this one is by far the softest! So easy and gentle on my gums. My kids notice the difference as well. My 4 year old uses this too and he actually cooperates now when I try to brush his teeth. :p Great toothbrush!!
customer_reviews.author: quickbee

customer_reviews.title: I like it, especially if it works
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! Very soft, no nasty flavor. Only negative, heads could be a little bigger. I have no way of knowing if it does anything that other toothbrushes don't but I do believe in the benefits of activated charcoal so it's worth a try especially since I like the feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Straw

customer_reviews.title: They have really sharp bristles... Hurts my ...
customer_reviews.text: They have really sharp bristles... Hurts my gums a little. Otherwise, it's a toothbrush, it does its job. I have to be honest though, I'm not thrilled that I have 3 left to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Choi

customer_reviews.title: Soft and do the job!  Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes! They are soft against my gums and clean my teeth well! I'm not sure I noticed any difference in teeth color but I didn't buy them for that purpose. I have bought them a couple times now.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: best toothbrush for sensitive teeth and gums!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these toothbrushes! Perfect for my sensitive gums, and somehow the charcoal bristles give a cleaner sensation than a standard soft brush.
customer_reviews.author: Marge O

customer_reviews.title: Great for chemo patients
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are the softest I could find. I am currently taking chemo treatments for breast cancer, this causes sore and bleeding gums. I would recommend these for anyone with gum issues.
customer_reviews.author: RubyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush Super soft yet bristles have integrity The bristles get into nooks & crannies as well as giving a smooth cleansed feel to teeth surface and no gum irritation Very pleased I will cont to purchase I do highly reccommend the product whether you are an aggressive brusher or not
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Xlent toothbrush Review
customer_reviews.text: I love the Xlent toothbrush! It is very soft which is what I needed as I have severe pain all over and it didn't hurt me but cleaned my teeth well. It is difficult to find extra soft toothbrushes in stores so I will be purchasing these from now on from you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: The first package that arrived I had to send back because it was soaking wet, and the toothbrushes were out of their packages. Not sure what happened. The second pack I got were undamaged. I was expecting more from this product. It did not whiten my teeth at all. It's just like any other toothbrush. I would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ferrucci

customer_reviews.title: Good for gums and teeth
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is comparable to colgate's "floss tip" brush. The xlent brushes are a lifesaver for my gums and better for my wallet! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mtee

customer_reviews.title: My teeth and gums are happy
customer_reviews.text: I grind my teeth, which leaves my gums sensitive, and I've tried a number of different tooth brushes with varying results. Most recently I stumbled on the Xtreme (which is a stupid name,) but a great tooth brush for me, at a really good price. It's gentle, and I'm happy with the clean I get from it as I use it through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Goggin

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, great for sensitive teeth and gums
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I stopped buying store-bought toothbrushes, they feel so soft and are small enough to reach my molars without any problem. Great for sensitive teeth and gums.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Softest toothbrush I've Found
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest toothbrush I've found on the market. Great quality and you get a lot of tooth-brushes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste after
customer_reviews.text: These seem great and are super soft, but they leave your mouth feeling gross after using them. The entire day I feel like I have bad breath and a bad taste in my mouth. I cannot get rid of it. I won’t use them anymore and ideally would like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very soft and last about two months before showing wear. The toothbrush handle feels really comfortable. I'm not sure if I just brush my teeth really hard but, the toothbrush does flex alittle bit when I brush my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Usalinh

customer_reviews.title: Ehh.. ok
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrushes were ok. Many of the bristles come out only after a few brushes and some seemed to have an odd taste. We ended up trashing the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to Many

customer_reviews.title: I Love How Soft These Are
customer_reviews.text: I spent too much time looking for an extra soft toothbrush in the store. I will look no further because these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SpiderMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased a lot of tooth brushes in the past claiming to be soft; yet they never were. However these actually live up to the name! Ive purchased these three times already and gave some away to my family and they all agree! 10/10 recommend! Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRULY SOFT
customer_reviews.text: SOFT SOFT SOFT! Finally a toothbrush that really is! I had bought even children's toothbrushes looking for something truly soft. They were all rough on my gums. I was not disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: ek

customer_reviews.title: Clean Teeth :-)
customer_reviews.text: Package was received in mint condition. Toothbrush is classified as soft, but it is not too soft. It still has body while brushing and does a thorough job of cleaning the teeth. I would recommend this product, have purchased before, and would buy it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Flexible handle and soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: Love how flexible the handle is and how soft the bristles are. I have been ordering these for a while now.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R. Madero

customer_reviews.title: EASY ON GUMS
customer_reviews.text: I WAS SURPRISED THAT THESE BRUSHES DID SUCH A GOOD JOB OF CLEANING WHILE AT THE SAME TIME BEING SO SOFT AND EASY ON THE GUMS. THE BLACK COLOR MIGHT HAVE TURNED ME OFF BUT I'M GLAD IT DIDN'T OR I'D HAVE MISSED OUT ON A GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carry them around and show my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Idk about this charcoal thing I'm sure it's a gimmick but I do attest they are actually super soft (unlike those other one's that were on here forever that got hard after the first couple of uses and then they shrunk the heads on them to save a penny you know who you are) and not to mention these brushes are cheap and look sick af like going to a rave in an all black tux.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, I've been using this for a month or so and at first was kind of difficult to get used to the soft bristles but once you get used to it, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I have had dental surgery & these toothbrushes are awesome! They have small heads & they are sturdy & I plan on buying several more before they quit making these! GREAT VALUE! GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: Ida M

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive teeth and gums
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! These brushes are fantastic. You don’t need hard bristles to brush your teeth. Just brush all over ...teeth, gums and tongue.
customer_reviews.author: TMSKULA

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft bristle toothbrush. I feel these clean my teeth much better than a traditional brush. I dont floss everyday, and I believe this brush is helping with that aspect also. Goes perfect with my activate charcoal whitening powder.
customer_reviews.author: THALES

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes. The bristles are so soft it like a message to your gums. I get a lot of plaque build up on my bottom front teeth but since using this toothbrush My teeth are whiter and so clean. Love these so much I bought a year supply for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peacher

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are the softest and best I have ever used. I always have a hard time with “soft” toothbrushes being hard and tearing my gums up. Not these! And they look cool. Definitely will by again
customer_reviews.author: Chase A.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for selling the charcoal super soft toothbrush. It has helped me a lot. This one doesn't tear my sensitive gums like the regular brushes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, mega-soft toothbrush. You never have to worry about abrading your tooth enamel or damaging your gums.
customer_reviews.author: Leah  B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I have tried some other brands, but I like these the best for handle feel and the softness of the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: June B

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the Soft bristles and charcoal..... I'd never liked soft bristles after trying some years ago. I'd never tried charcoal. The bristles on this toothbrush are indeed soft, gentle, but they are made so well, to do the job! I am very satisfied with this purchase and will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: rose hermsen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The extra soft bristles clean gently but better than you would expect. Not too sure about the credibility of the charcoal factor, though. Good price for a multipack. I may purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried these charcoal bristle toothbrush and let me tell you... they are so soft, not rough,they don't hurt my gums or make my gums bleed. the bristles stay the same unlike other toothbrushes. we are happy with these toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Handle poorly shaped.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I found the perfect toothbrush. The bristles are nice and soft. The brush head is not to big or to small. However, the handle is so oddly shaped you can’t hold it comfortably and brush your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: They're TOO soft...it doesn't feel like it is cleaning well. There are also few studies that support claims that activated charcoal toothbrushes actually work. My wife bought these but they seem kind of gimmicky.
customer_reviews.author: Team Victory

customer_reviews.title: Soft toothbrush need to be revisited
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft bristle and the charcoal adds a special cleansing agent
customer_reviews.author: Fashionable 60s

customer_reviews.title: Is there such a thing as too soft? If ...
customer_reviews.text: Is there such a thing as too soft? If so, these are it! If “extra soft” is what you are looking for then these are just about as soft as they get.
customer_reviews.author: David Washburn

customer_reviews.title: So soft and a clean feel after use
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, this toothbrush. I never realized how a soft truth brush can actually make brushing your teeth feel so clean and polished. Especially when using it with the charcoal. You won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: SheWritesPublications

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: These are soft bristles. Only used medium and hard in the past. Can't believe they still get the job done. Purchased them to go with the charcoal natural toothpaste so I don't worry about staining no other toothbrush. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: Not giving result
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad to use but it's not doing what suppose to do an especially not seeing quick result or any for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I will buy these again. They are very soft bristles and a bit smaller then an average toothbrush head. So much easier to get the hard to reach spots. As for the charcoal, I dont notice any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Andria H

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband he loved them they last aa long time very soft what Dental hygenist suggests.no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sd

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not great
customer_reviews.text: I need soft tooth brushes, 1st off the one thing I do like about these is the softness of the bristles. But that’s about it. I feel like these tooth brushes need more bristles as the tooth paste seems to be a permanent resident on the bottom. The other thing when brushing sweeping down 45 deg on teeth the handle feels flimsy. The whole charcoal whatever I can take it or leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Shell16

customer_reviews.title: great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Very good toothbrush. Soft and makes teeth feel very clean.
customer_reviews.author: austin h

customer_reviews.title: Love...
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for the softest toothbrush and this one definitely fits the bill. Extra soft and the grip is great!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are fantastic! The bristles are very soft and so they are gentle on gums. Plus, the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Super Gentle Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: If you like a toothbrush that is gentle to your teeth, give the Activated Charcoal Bristle Toothbrush a try.
customer_reviews.author: Caroltee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ones to have for sensitive teeth. And if wear dentures doesn’t scratch your gums when cleaning mouth. I know because I have both.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: They do a great job of cleaning my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I have receding gums, so need a soft toothbrush. These don't last a long time, but that OK because the softness and spacing of the bristles is exactly what I was looking for. They do a great job of cleaning my teeth. This is my second order, and I expect to order more.
customer_reviews.author: joycewe

customer_reviews.title: Satified
customer_reviews.text: I change my brush at least once a month so buying a few at a time is good for me.This is a good brush, gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. LarhetteTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love the product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the product. As good as was advertised. Delivery was prompt and well-packaged. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built well, works well
customer_reviews.text: Good and soft, not hurting at all. Will hope their are more for the future
customer_reviews.author: Jose Canas

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles fall out every once in a while. Still a good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hood

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are so soft! There’s no irritation on my gums and I can easily keep brushing passed 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for very soft toothbrushes to replace my old one and these were not nearly as soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: Nice for my sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are great and super soft. I have sensitive teeth so this is a great buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Britney A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these soft toothbrushes. I need a soft brush for my sensitive gums. Most brands claim to be soft but are not. These are perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft on gums
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I love these brushes. I have very sensitive gums and they are great for my mouth. Thy clean very well and are a great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JeffP

customer_reviews.title: Great for gum recession
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft but long-lasting. I've ordered a second set and will order again. My dentist approves!
customer_reviews.author: Unlisted

customer_reviews.title: Love the price and durability
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and durability of this product. The bristles are nice and soft like my dental hygienist recommends. I will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: PegRob2

customer_reviews.title: Good for the sensitive gums
customer_reviews.text: Soft with small heads. Good for small mouths and sensitive gums. Black bristles fade quickly which makes me feel like I need to replace them frequently.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyDea

product_meta.title: Activated Charcoal Bristle Toothbrush - Xtreme (Extreme) Soft, Ultrafine, Tapered bristles, Compact Head & Slim Design - (4 Count)
product_meta.description: Size:4 Count (Pack of 1)Xlent's activated charcoal bristle toothbrush have tapered ultra fine soft bristles that cleans the teeth and provide gentle massage to gums. Its compact head helps reaching all the way to back teeth and remove plaque gently.
feature_bullets: HealthProductsMart is the ONLY authorized seller of the Xlent brand products on Amazon; purchases from unauthorized sellers are not guaranteed
Tapered polyester bristles are infused with activated charcoal and designed to remove maximum plaque
Xtreme (Extreme) Soft bristles deliver a gentle, yet effective, gum massage
Compact head and slim design help reach back teeth. Tapered & Ultrafine bristles effectively reach between teeth and remove plaque
Ergonomically designed handle provides comfort and ease while brushing
